name: Air War 64x64
description:
If you don't initially see the game, give it a few seconds to load. If it still doesn't load let me know :).

Here's my entry for the 2016 Low Res Jam. It's a simple combat flight sim inspired by the classic Red Baron game. Apologies for the lack of engine sounds.

Thanks to http://www.bfxr.net/ for the sounds that are there.

Enjoy and feel free to leave comments. Feedback is much appreciated.

Controls:

A - Bank Left

D - Bank Right

LMB - Fire
